website_summaries.verdict: Creates attractive pictures in an instant in indoor settings and at a pretty price.
pros: Reviews suggest the lighting creates bright and fun pictures
Works especially well when used indoors for professional-looking results
cons: Review instructions to get the most out of each setting

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, portable, and bright
customer_reviews.text: I admit it - I am obsessed with this style of selfie light! I've purchased LOTS of them and they're all very very similar. I was seriously shocked at how bright the lights are and how it fits on all of my friend's phones (and they're all different styles)! I love that there are multiple light settings, that it's so portable and lightweight. It was THE hit of the holidays and I put them into everyone's stockings!
customer_reviews.author: Creating Everyday

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright but shorter battery life
customer_reviews.text: This definitely helps with brightness and makes for a better quality photo/video. However, the battery life is a little short. Be sure to fully charge it before taking it with you and maybe take a back up charger along or get two lights to have one after the battery dies in the other
customer_reviews.author: brant guilfoyle

customer_reviews.title: Works well for lightweight phones.
customer_reviews.text: This selfie ring is multi functional and has a variety of helpful features. The clip for the device itself is padded to prevent against any sort if scratching but still holds tightly. There is a flexible holder for the phone so it can be held in multiple positions, and the light is on a another holder so they can be moved for different pictures. The light produces three varying degrees of white, and makes for some excellent photos.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Good for instagram stories or youtubers
customer_reviews.text: This hands free selfie light ring is great for instagram stories, YouTube videos or for video messaging. It has 3 different light settings. I like the day light one the most. It has a clamp clip to hold it in place. I've used it to facetime my parents when I'm showing them their grand daughter. I've also used it to do unboxing videos of plants which I'm really into for instagram. The goose neck holds the light and phone in place, so you can position them in any angle. The only thing is you do need a USB power source. I wish it was rechargeable. I have to plug it into my laptop or use a power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting
customer_reviews.text: Get this selfie ring light!. I love taking pictures in my bathroom but my lights make my pictures come out yellowish. This selfie light works amazing. It's small so its very easy to carry around and it takes 30 seconds to figure out how to use. The charge on it also lasts all day long. Not to bright either so no worrying about your eyes squinting, best purchase ever. Definitely comes in handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Caldera

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright - Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I tried few other selfie lights in the past but most of them get charging from phone and would drain the phone battery or work at low light. this light takes the power from external USB and works at different light spectrum. the controller wire comes with on off switch, brightness adjuster switch and spectrum control switch. The videos and picture are very bright and really works great. I love this product,
customer_reviews.author: Sri Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to small spaces, live sales or doing nails!
customer_reviews.text: Bright and comes at the perfect height perfect for live sales or to hold my phone while I'm doing nails so I can see who is calling while I'm working on a client! The light is taller than the phone holder so you can move it to any angle you need! The phone holder also expands easily the side bars slide out with resistance which I like more than the adjustable knob because those come loose. I bought this to replace my tripod and save space.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: Projects lots of light and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Although I could have bought it cheaper but it arrived next day and exactly as described. Projects lots of light and selfies look great. I also use it to project light on reading, applying lashes on my clients and more. It is very compact and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Eme

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was easy to install, easy to use, and portable. Nothing huge and perfect size for selfies.
customer_reviews.author: Susy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable . It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of the product, it is worth the investment. This ring is made of a resistant material, the tones of the lights are easy to adjust. The only thing that should be mentioned is that the base where the stick is clipped must be stable and strong otherwise it moves too much and can even fall. I definitely recommend it gives more lighting to your photos or videos.
customer_reviews.author: Mili

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lighting
customer_reviews.text: OMG this just made my life a little easier for my videos. I am completely satisfied with the lighting. I used it for the first time yesterday and everyone was complementing about lighting on my video. This was a perfect addition for me. Has a few different settings as well I’m happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Well....
customer_reviews.text: Happily surprised by this! I definitely didn’t think that it was going to work and was right it work’s for about 10 minutes after fully charged..... so you get what you pay for !
customer_reviews.author: Tat2 J-me

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of it. I bought it to replace a great one that I'd lost. This one works ok. I like the different levels of light and it's easy to use but it's kinda of clumsy/bulky clipped onto my phone. It's cheap looking too.
customer_reviews.author: SAI

customer_reviews.title: I am not a techie.  I’ll just put that out there.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and worked well for the social media I needed it for. I hadn’t realized what a difference the lighting made. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: take beautiful selfies with this 🌸
customer_reviews.text: Really nice selfie light or baby ring light as I like to call it, I bought it to take better pictures of my make up and so far it's been doing it's job would definitely recommend 🙌 Also the 3 light settings are pretty cool from natural to bright white light ✨
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Have to hold super close to face
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this! Have to hold phone incredibly close to face. Did not work on any other devices since it needs to be very very close!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not a great design
customer_reviews.text: It partially covers the screen which is annoying and the light is too harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan  Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: High cost performance
customer_reviews.text: The filling light lamp is very atmospheric, or like the cold color of the filling light lamp is very bright according to the skin, easy to reflect the beauty of the skin, and the size can be adjusted, the lamp cost performance is very high, than the same price of the filling light lamp are much stronger, enough to compare with the professional equipment

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: They were purchase for gifts for my family members. They were a hit from age ranging from 7 to 19 years of age. They all immediately start taking photos.
customer_reviews.author: Davida

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Lasts about 2 minutes before dimming.
customer_reviews.text: The light doesn't last long. It has to be kept plugged into the USB port while in use. The cord is SUPER short, so when charging, it can't be positioned to the top of your laptop as it should be when in use.
customer_reviews.author: W. Walker

customer_reviews.title: clear and bright without shadows
customer_reviews.text: The light in my office is very dark. When I take photos in the office. it is really great. because the photos I take make my face clear and bright without shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Yates

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this selfie light on my iPhone. I like it very much. The light on my face can make me more beautiful when taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light! ;p
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday (on time) but I’ve tried it out and love the product so far. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Suitable to carry
customer_reviews.text: It's very suitable for going out when it is time to carry it. it is small and does not take up space. I like it very much

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I have the iPhone 11 Pro Max. But it’s too small.. if you have small phone I think work perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting
customer_reviews.text: I am sooooo Happy with this Ring light. It's the perfect size. I can take it every where. Every picture has the perfect light . Even my TIK TOKS have the perfect lighting. I give it million stars !!!!!💯

customer_reviews.title: Best I've seen
customer_reviews.text: First, it's pink <3! Clips easily to phone and does not damage it. Rechargeable is a huge bonus!

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: For my selfies, the lighting doesn't make much of s difference. The battery life is super short so if you want to use this out & about, I'd recommend carrying a portable charger.
customer_reviews.author: ₍՞◌′ᵕ‵ू◌₎♡

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It’s light weight and bright! Easy to charge!

customer_reviews.title: Received and had broken glass everywhere
customer_reviews.text: When my friend opened her gift the lights around the cuticular selfie was busted with glass everywhere

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Has 3 different light settings, they all are really good for pictures and videos. I love that I can clip it on my phone and it’s light weight and pink ❤️

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: This is a good choice. easy to carry. because I need to take most photos with my phone. and now I don’t have to worry about it at night

customer_reviews.text: Works great for pics. Def makes a difference. Awesome pics. Well with it

customer_reviews.text: It’s really good for selfies and Ig stories, I’m a blogger and it’s perfect

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it randomly broke
customer_reviews.text: As far as functionality, this thing was great. Super bright and held a charge for a decent amount of time. But it broke so easily! I plugged it in one day a few weeks after purchasing and the charging port just disconnected and fell inside, lost forever.

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is Battery Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Just like title says I only get about 3 hours of battery time at the lowest setting. Other than that it's great.

customer_reviews.text: Couldn't use it with my iPhone, it blocks the lens on my phone. Didn't care for the tone of light it had.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product! It does not work! It won’t turn on or do anything. Waste of money! I bought this to help with lighting for digital learning and I am SO disappointed. I would give negative starts if it was an option.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a more quality light- this one is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible light! It does not “light” up anything. It is cheap and plastic. Do not recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This did not make my photos look better at all....maybe if I was in the dark but otherwise it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: shelbilly

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Product completely stopped working after battery ran down will not charge even with multiple chargers ..not pleased
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Charger pieces always breaking
customer_reviews.text: Charger piece keeps breaking. Been thru 2 ring lights. Great lighting but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sando Pelima

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little selfie ring light. It just clamps onto a surface, and then uses a usb to power it. I use it at my desk, mainly because it holds my phone and is a desk lamp more than an actual selfie ring for me! It has several different modes, and the brightness can be adjusted which is super helpful! The one thing that is weird, is that it only has the USB to power the light - it also doesn't come with a power adapter for the usb, so if you're using it anywhere where you just have an outlet, you will need to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Turner

customer_reviews.title: VERY BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This light is really handy. The light has three brightness settings, and the battery recharges, which is great. The plastic didn't feel super strong, but for the price I didn't mind. The design makes it easy to take pictures while maintaining a good grip on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kate A.

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie light!
customer_reviews.text: I use this light when I teach English classes online and need better lighting. It is easy to use and lights my space well! My only complaint is that I wish it had a charge tracker--I cannot tell when it is fully charged or how much longer it has before dying.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my phone with an outerbox case on. 3 levels off brightness makes for perfect lighting for selfies.
customer_reviews.author: BeeZee

customer_reviews.title: without worrying about scratches
customer_reviews.text: It can be directly clipped to the phone without worrying about scratches. it can be used with confidence. super easy to use. compact and light enough. I like this very much
customer_reviews.author: Benny Berry

customer_reviews.title: Worked great... for 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: And then it just crapped out. The power button stopped working, and it flashed on and off and pulsed with light whenever the hell it wanted to until the battery finally died out.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Bright but brightness doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I use the light when I'm teaching. Classes are 80 minutes each but even on full charge the light lasts less than 1 hour. I basically have to keep it plugged in while I'm teaching. Other than that, it's great
customer_reviews.author: Al Gebra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good value
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I liked it, there just isn’t a lot of difference between the levels of light, might’ve been nice to have a slightly dimmer light for the low setting.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Cheap. Not very bright. Florescent type light that’s unflattering.

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. easy to install and operate. the ring light is very good. the quality is good. the price is reasonable. the effect of the photos is very satisfactory. just what I need.

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of help!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. The light is bright but not dazzling. The light does not heat up after a long time! The light is soft and easy to adjust. Especially easy to use and strong.

customer_reviews.title: Selfie Game Strong!
customer_reviews.text: This steps up your selfie game, BIG TIME! It sticks on to your phone really well and the lighting is great. 10/10 recommend getting it.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described

customer_reviews.text: Maybe if I didn’t cover so much of the phone an just cover around the camera it would be better. The light is bright just in the way.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this clip on ring light, it has three light modes, and I think it can make my face look more bright and smooth. In a dimly lit room, you can easily connect to the phone and brighten your face. Even in the dark, my phone can recognize my face through the selfie light.

product_meta.title: UMsky Selfie Ring Light,Universal Phone Selfie Ring Light,Portable LED Selfie Light Ring Lights for Android/iPhone, LED Ring Light, Rechargeable Brightness Portable Selfie Light Ring (Pink)
feature_bullets: 🇺🇸Selfie ring light has 4 levels Gears Brightness,The fourth gear need long press, the ring light will be flashing ,Provide lenses fill light effect for creative photography and videography in dark environment With 36 LED bulbs, this specially designed selfie light provides supplemental,4 mode of brihtness lighting for your choose Power by USB Charger.

🇺🇸Selfie light ring with 30 LED bulbs, this specially designed selfie light provides supplemental or side lighting for photography when ever you have low light conditions. It also helps you to get higher quality pictures and videos even when just low-light is available.Suitable for iphone/andriod cell phone

🇺🇸No need to plug it in and is super easy to use. Just clamp this flexible clip style light on your smart phone and pressing the power button and you will get the supplementary lighting. With 4 different levels of brightness, you'll find the perfect lighting needed for your photos

🇺🇸Compatible with smart phones and tablet pc ipad: iPhone 6s / 6s Plus / 6 /6 Plus / 5s / 5c / 5 / 4s / 4, Samsung Galaxy series like Galaxy S7 S7 Edge, S6, S6 Edge, Note 5, LG Phones, Moto, Huawei, HTC, Sony and other smart phones
